title: OpenSearch compatibility documentation
body:
### Describe the bug

The [documentation](https://quarkus.io/version/main/guides/hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch#opensearch) refers that you should only set the quarkus.hibernate-search-orm.elasticsearch.version=opensearch:1.2 to be compatible with opensearch. But when trying to connect and as described in hibernate [documentation](https://docs.jboss.org/hibernate/search/6.1/reference/en-US/html_single/#backend-elasticsearch-configuration-version) you should also set the quarkus.hibernate-search-orm.elasticsearch.version-check.enabled=false . An update to the documentation would be very usefull
